Class CrossFieldValidator

java.lang.Object
CrossFieldValidator
public class CrossFieldValidator extends Object
Higher-level rules that depend on multiple fields.

    • validateDateRange

      public ValidationResult validateDateRange(String startDate, String endDate)
      Ensure startDate <= endDate and both valid (format + chronology).
      Parameters:
      startDate - the starting date to validate (string/DTO placeholder)
      endDate - the ending date to validate (string/DTO placeholder)
      Returns:
      validation result with error if range invalid

    • validateBudgetBalance

      Returns:
      validation result
